text:
Laura: Where are you?
Paul: Almost there.
Laura: Which is?
Paul: Close to the Mac.
Laura: That's so far away!
Paul: 15 mins
Laura: I am not waiting any more, see you some other time.
Paul: Please, wait!
Laura: I've waited 30 minutes, 15 minutes ago you wrote you were almost here. This is too much.
Paul: I am so sorry.
Laura: I am not
